fields.descriptive_line: Two sections through mezzanine level, kitchen and bathroom and laundry, bathroom and main volume of apartment by Brookes Stacey and Randall Chris Lowe loft apartment, 1994.
fields.physical_description: Two sections through mezzanine level, kitchen and bathroom and laundry, bathroom and main volume of apartment. Titled section C C and D D, annotated with working notes for construction printed on adhesive acetate.
fields.title: GA Sections - Cross sections CC&DD
fields.materials_techniques: Black technical pen on tracing vellum with printed annotation on adhesive acetate.
fields.location: Prints & Drawings Study Room, level D, case ROLL BELOW LL CUPBOARD
fields.marks:
'ALAN BROOKES ASSOCIATES / ARCHITECTS + TECHNOLOGY CONSULTANTS / APARTMENT ONE 1-10 SUMNERS STREET LONDON EC1 / GA SECTIONS  Cross sections CC&DD   29/07/94 / DWG. NO.275-3-01 / 1:20'
 'ISSUED FOR CONSTRUCTION / ALL DIMENSIONS, RADII AND OFFSETS / FOR SETTING OUT SHOWN ON DRAWINGS / TO BE CHECKED ON SITE BY CONTRACTOR / TEMPLATES TO BE MADE OF CURVED /  WALLS / Rev B '
 'Opening rooflight with flush toughned /double glazing (schuco 50/SG system) / on fully wielded 150x100 RHS frame with / white polyester coated finish. / Internal louvres - Naturally adonised / aluminium Technical Blinds sunshield 165 / system with curved mechanism.'
'25mm plasterboard + skim with painted / finish to undersid eof existing roof steels.'
'30mm die stainless steel handrail'
'Mezzanine'
'Iguzzini 'Shuttle' framing projector / spotlight with rear mounted transformer / cat no 8475'
'500x500 module paving slabs relaid / on plastic pots centered from new / rooflight'
'EXISTING GALVINISED STEEL RAIL'
'Existing chimney stack removed to / parapet level and made good'
'GLASS BRIDGE WITH RAIL'
'ROOF TERRACE'
'Folded stainless steel shelf 2 skins 3mm / sheet separated by 30mm high 20mm dia / SS spacers. Shelf fixed via stainless / steel 50mmx 25mm oval tube with socket / fixing to mezzanine. Fixed via folded / cable tray to party wall'
'Iguzzini low voltage mirror downlighters / centred over kitchen units'
'SS cooker hood'
'Flush painted MDF doors to cupboard'
'KITCHEN'
'Flush naturally adonised perforated folded / 4mm alunimium top hung sliding pivoting / screens with stretched lycra over / internal face'
'Fully boxed stud partition wall with mosaic / tiled finished with stainless steel drainage / chanel to falls under and stainless steel / chanel over with wide grillage to air / extract'
'Existing SVP'
'Staircase with toughnede galss treads and  / risers and stainless steel stringers'
'BATHROOM'
'SERVICE ZONE'
'2 piece stainless steel castings (by / Charles Henshaw and sons) Base bolted / via 300x   300 I  section to concrete slab. / Top casting fixed to base casting using SS / pig nosed bolts.'
'SECTION C C ' 
'Curved toughned 10, acid etched glass / screens fixed to casting supports using / flush counter sunk fittings'
' 60 mm laminated birch counter top with / inset drawers. / Folded stainless steel sheet kitchen units / on galvinised 40x40 angle frame fixed / back to main steels in partition. / Each unit to have pivoting sliding door to / front. / 7 No Wandsworth 50mm dia unswitched / sockets mounted on stainless steel cover / plate flush mounted onto stud wall 75mm / above worktop'
'Spun stainless steel sink 510mm dia with / stainless steel waste and trap. / Stainless steel Vola mixer taps and spout / fixed on wall with 20mm rod towel rail / set into counter top' 'Stainless steel Vola Hemispherical / washbaison with Stainless steel Vola long / handled taps with fixed spout (Type 1511) Flourescent lights and shaver / point to side. Stainless steel orbital / mirror fixed to partition.'
'Existing SVP'
'Floor void'
 '827.5 / Existing copper roof structure'
'EXTERNAL LAMP / MOON LIGHT EXTERNAL LIGHT FITTING FIXED / TO TOP OF SPINE OF GAVD. STEEL SPIURAL STAIR / (REFER TO LIGHTING SCHEDULE)'
'Existing galvanised handrail'
'25mm plasterboard + skim with / finish to underside of existing roof steels'
'All exisiting steel work encased with / 25mm plasterboard and skim with painted / finish.'
'Im dia double glazed flush mounted roof / light. 25mm laminated toughned top / layer with 6mm toughned inner layer. Stainless steel frame. Rooflight centred / over bath.'
External weather proof box containing / " No power sockets 1 TV , ! phone and / dimmable switching to 2 No upper terrace / lights'
'6 no pixel frameing projector light flush / fitting with plasterboard skin to ceiling. / (cat No 8075)'
'Florescent downlighter trough flush with / plasterboard + skim to underside of  / bathroom slab.'
'Concrete ring beam 250x300 deep / formed to take new rooflight'
'Tumble dryer and washing machine in / cupboard with lacquered MDF door. / Note Airbrick needed to vent to outside. /  Dryer should also vent to outside / Birch slatted bench with white polyester / powder coated gilled tube radiator under'
'LAUNDRY'
'10mm acid etched glass louvres bonded / to pivot mechanism'
'BATHROOM'
'Pietra laro limestone 800x600 floor laid to fall'
'Flush naturally adonised perforated folded / 4mm aluminium top hung sliding pivoting / screens with stretched lycra over / internal face'
'MAIN VOLUME'
'Flooring 600x1500 plywood panels'
Floor substructure renewed and made / good as neccessary'
'Vertical pivot screens 827.5mm wide / precurved / clear 8mm polycarbonate sheets with / self-adhesive Birch veneer boded to / outer face of curved polycarbonate / sheets. Sheets to be fixed to stainless / steel 48mm RHS support and pivot / mechanism with flush flush ball race at / head and base. Stainless steel pig nosed / bolts used throughout. / Note: Ball race to resist opening of / shutters past 135 deg . Screen nect to / Party wall restricted to 90 deg / movement.'
'SECTION D D'
 'REVISIONS  A. Redrawn 22.08.94 / Rev B / Kitchen / Bathroom / Rooflight altered'

fields.history_note: Original working drawings and designs for Chris Lowe loft apartment, Sumners Street, London, EC1 designed by architects Brookes Stacey Randell.
